document_data.mainbody:
Bracetar was an author and scholar writing in or before the 14 century DR.
By the 1370s DR, Bracetars work Notes On Preservation of Foodstuffs and Oils was amongst the works in Candlekeep.
In the , Noumea Cardellith, pretending to be a merchant from Lantan, claimed to be interested in Bracetars Notes On Preservation of Foodstuffs and Oils when seeking admittance to Candlekeep.
